description: Ruby Stars Japanese Maple is an amazing small tree with a unique look. With its bright, coral-red foliage all year round and its delicate, layered, lacy branches, it's sure to be an attractive addition to any garden. This low maintenance tree requires little pruning and produces very little surface roots when grown in an appropriately-sized container. Its striking, star-like foliage will bring an element of color and movement to any space. Ruby Stars Japanese Maple is a showstopper, sure to make any garden more beautiful.
